a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Estimated aumber of suicides per 100,000 people in a given population and year. Suicide deaths are
many countries due to social stigma and cultural or legal concerns. This data is based on modeling of global
patterns, and includes adjustments that aim to account for missing data and underreporting.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
